404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It may have been moved, deleted, or the URL might be incorrect.
404.help: This usually happens when a page has been moved or removed, or if there's a typo in the web address.

suggestions.checkUrl: Check the web address for typos
suggestions.useNavigation: Use the navigation menu to find what you need
suggestions.searchContent: Try searching for the content you were looking for

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix this issue.
500.help: This is a temporary issue with our servers. Please try again in a few moments.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
serverError.help: Our servers are temporarily unavailable. This is usually resolved quickly.

suggestions.refresh: Refresh the page in a few moments
suggestions.wait: Wait a few minutes and try again
suggestions.contact: Contact us if the problem persists

general.title: Something Went Wrong
general.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

contact.text: If this problem continues, please let us know:
